header.title: About Me
body: I'm an experienced principle engineer and cloud architect guiding teams with their development of scalable and robust digital services. I am experienced in developing end-to-end applications in Python and Typescript. In a past life I was a full stack developer with over 15 years experience producing web and mobile applications, and leading agile teams, in a wide variety of industries.

items.body: Leading a team of scientific software engineers that creates tools for scientific verification
Providing architectural and technical expertise for end-to-end delivery of modern software solutions for forecasters and scientists
Engaging with the enterprise as a whole to improve the user and developer experiences for delivery of research software and platforms
Producing full automation of the VerificationHub system to enable continuous delivery and repeatable, hands-free deployments
Defining governance and architectural principles around development processes and standards
Mentoring and guidance of the Forecast Quality software team

items.title: Jive - VerificationHub
items.body: Jive provides users with an interactive data verification environment and easy access to over 8 years of forecast and observation data.

items.title: Insight and Innovation Award - Bureau Excellence Awards
items.body: Awarded for sustained excellence in improving the Jive forecast verification system which has enabled the Bureau to streamline public weather forecasting through greater trust and reliance on automated guidance.
Leading the digital solutions team that produces user-focused web and mobile applications
Providing architectural and technical expertise for end-to-end delivery of modern full-stack digital solutions for the general public
Engaging with the enterprise as a whole to improve the user and developer experiences for delivery of digital services
Leading the implementation of a large-scale serverless cloud API platform providing RESTful APIs for both internal and external use
Redefining and redeveloping the Bureau's digital service offering for the general public
Defining governance and architectural principles around development processes and standards
Mentoring and guidance of the digital solutions team

items.title: BOM Weather
items.body: A multiple award winning Android and iOS application putting the Bureau's weather information into the hands of our users.

items.title: BOM Developer Portal and API Platform
items.body: A modern platform allowing self-service access to the Bureau's upcoming API offerings, built using serverless architecture.
Leading a devops team to produce user-focused applications
Developing end-to-end, full-stack web application solutions for the Bureau's growing web presence
Building the app framework that underpins the current generation of Bureau web applications

items.title: Bureau's mobile website
items.body: A responsive site designed for mobile phones and tablets that utilises a new data API driven by a custom PHP framework.

items.title: Defence Product Visualiser
items.body: A tool that allows users to create customised card-based dashboards displaying a range of relevant weather products.

items.title: wxFramework
items.body: An in-house PHP framework custom built for building applications that utilise the large datasets the Bureau produces daily.

items.title: Injury Master Platform
items.body: Injury Master is used by employers and case managers to improve the workflow of workplace injury assessments, recovery and back to work programs. Allowed generation of templated Word and Excel documents for WorkCover forms, medical appointments and similar. Tracked medical certificate expiry.

items.title: Shop, Stock and Bill
items.body: An intergrated online store and stock / inventory system. Allows integration with common accounting systems, creating a full end-to-end solution for the client.

items.title: Client Management System
items.body: A client management and marketing tool that allows targeted, customisable SMS and email marketing information to be delivered to hundreds of thousands of clients easily.
